description: This file defines a React functional component 'Topbar' which renders a header section with the title, user greeting, and action buttons for searching, adding expenses, and signing out. It includes styling and event dispatching for opening an expense modal.

methods.name: Topbar()
methods.description: React functional component rendering the top navigation bar with user info and action buttons.

methods.name: openAddExpense
methods.description: Function to dispatch a custom event to open the expense modal in create mode.
